main event: Two objects were observed in the sky over Miami Beach, Florida, resembling falling stars, with a total observation time of 7-8 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were seen moving in a zig-zag pattern and appeared to interact with each other,The observer noted that the objects had a clear trail behind them like falling stars but traveled faster than a typical meteor,The objects were described as brighter than ordinary stars,The sighting occurred on a clear night with visible stars and no wind,Despite the appearance of the objects, the observer expressed a desire to believe they were simply falling stars and not UFOs.
witness description: a family consisting of the observer, his wife, and their children
